Label: Purpose
Is Version Of: To indicate that an item is part of a series of resources that are updated or altered and to provide a link to a different variant or adaption.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Is Version Of: Enter the ID of the most recent related record OR create a parent record to group versions together.

Label: Commentary
Is Version Of: If entering the ID of a parent record, see [Member Of](../ogm-aardvark/#member-of) and [Is Part Of](../ogm-aardvark/#is-part-of) for similar examples.
